title: Drawing, "Decorative Study; Verso: Anatomical Studies of Heads", 1814–18
medium: Pen and ink over graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Three capitals; ten entries of sarcophagi. Verso: two barbarian heads in profile from antique.
